title: Populate product catalog with many unique tech/gadget products

requirements.summary: Populate the PRODUCTS array in ProductCatalog.tsx with at least 40 unique tech/gadget products spanning a wide variety of categories
acceptanceCriteria: At least 40 distinct products are present in the PRODUCTS array
Products span at least 8 different categories
Each product has a unique id, name, short description, numeric price, category string, and rating value
No duplicate product names exist in the catalog
All products are visible and filterable in the catalog grid on the frontend
Category filter chips correctly filter the expanded product list

file_operations.description: Expand the PRODUCTS array to include at least 40 unique tech/gadget products spanning at least 8 categories (e.g., smartphones, laptops, wearables, audio, smart home, gaming, photography, networking, accessories, drones, VR/AR, health tech, robotics, e-readers). Each product must have a unique id (e.g., 'prod-001'), name, short description (1-2 sentences), numeric price, category string, rating value (0-5), and an image field (emoji or placeholder string). Ensure no duplicate product names exist. Maintain the existing data structure and do not modify the catalog UI layout, filtering, or sorting logic. Use realistic product names, prices, and descriptions appropriate for a tech/gadget e-commerce site.
